Author: bootload
Title: Tom Coates Future of Web Apps, Translated for Product Managers - 06

Author: kul
Content: Meeting Ev in Oxford in November 04 was one of the catalysts to me leaving my banking job and coming to the Valley. For that, I'll always be grateful (and that he invited us to work in the Obvious offices for YC).

Author: Kaizyn
Content: You find ideas in one of several ways:  1) you bricolage them together from reading a lot in a wide range of topics or 2) you think long and hard about a single problem you want to solve.  In the former, you come up with something interesting and new because it's an unexpected and novel recombination of ideas normally not found in the same place (cross-discipline).  For the latter, you will cover a large and interesting search space where you hopefully find a number of interesting ideas that each taken by itself gives you just a small part of the solution.
